name: Elf Before Christmas (DEMO)
description:
One night, a mysterious blizzard consumed the North Pole, and everything changed. It carried unknown parasites that seems to have the ability to latch onto any living being or object and take possession of it. You will play as an Elf named Damien who must fight through corrupted creatures, friends, and Santa before Christmas Eve arrives. These parasites multiply with ease and if not stopped before Christmas, the world will be completely taken over. 

Since this is a demo, only chapter 1 is available to play. But, I do hope you enjoy this short adventure with hand drawn pixel art and custom made tracks!

Support the Development

If you want to support me please be sure to leave a comment of your thoughts and to follow me to be updated more on future games and updates to this development. 

Credits
  • All Soundtracks were made by Manti, check out some of his past works too! https://drmanticore.itch.io/
  • Most of the Sound effects I used:
    1. Essential Retro Video Game Sound Effects Collection [512 sounds] by Juhani Junkala
    2. Waterfall Sound Effect HQ by Virtual Ambience
    3. Minecraft Bunny and Bat death sound effects
  • Special thanks to Rafa's Discord Community as they helped me a lot with some coding issues! https://discord.gg/TG2heucUPP
  • And lastly special thanks to HeartBeast in his Godot Action RPG Series as it gave me the running start to make this a reality!
